 My name is Goodnews Sandy, i am a frontend developer and a technical writer.  I enjoy building web-based applications that leaves lasting impression on users using various frontend technologies.  i love contributing to open source. My hobbies: sports and reading 

I am contributing to the OSCSA Community through outreachy internship  and  i am excited about the things i will be learning in the community. i believe the knowledge from this experience would be an added value to my skillset and career progression in general.

I will be sharing my progress and experience from time to time, So..Let's do this!!
